price: 27. Waxaan dhab ahaan ugu soo qaadannay dadka Qur'aankan dhexdi tusaale nooc kasta leh inay waantoobaan.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ḍarabnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
